rows.label: xs08100100_MSG0001
rows.name:
Word is, numerous enemy Dolls
have entered the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08100100_SEL0011
rows.name: Show a strong will to protect NLA.

rows.label: xs08100100_MSG0002
rows.name:
I'm counting on you.
Let's take out every enemy we find, one after the other.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08100100_MSG0005
rows.name:
The gates are already closed, and besides, there are
enemy ground forces outside too, so give up on that idea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08100100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Prepare yourself.
We have no choice but to fight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08100100_MSG0008
rows.name: An unidentified unit has appeared in the Commercial District.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08100100_MSG0009
rows.name:
There are two of them, but they're powerful.
They're causing considerable damage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08100100_MSG0010
rows.name: Once you've cleared out your surroundings, head over there.[ST:wait ]
